name: Montenegro
startIntroPart1: May God be with us, o holy Metropolitan Danilo I! The holy land of Montenegro is ours! We have a long road ahead of us! The Ottomans will fear us!
startIntroPart2: Your Eminence, Montenegro calls upon you to lead and protect it! Will you make Montenegro great? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: You will pay for your war!
uniques: +1 Sight for all land military units
Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills
